name: 2DPlatformer Final
description:
This is my final of 2D Platformer. Here are a few of the modifications that I have made:

1. I created three completely different levels that are all unique in their own way.

2. As you will see, each level has their own new challenge that needs to be completed before going onto the next level.

3. Each level has their own difficulties and as you progress, each level will get harder and harder to complete in order to win the game. 

4. Every level is different with new characters, obstacles, and different ways to find the key in order to proceed to the next round.

Hope you enjoy! Thank you.

-Created by Nicholas Gorelik
